ModuleIndexReverseLookup.hh

00001 #ifndef _ModuleIndexReverseLookup_hh_
00002 #define _ModuleIndexReverseLookup_hh_
00003 #include "MappingAndAlignment.hh"
00004 #include <stdexcept>
00005 
00006 namespace CALICE {
00009 class ModuleIndexReverseLookup
00010 {
00011 public:
00012   //  ModuleIndexReverseLookup();
00013   //  ~ModuleIndexReverseLookup();
00014 
00020   void createIndexReverseLookup(const MappingAndAlignment &mapping);
00021 
00031   inline pair<UInt_t, UInt_t> getModuleAndCellIndex(const MappingAndAlignment &mapping, const CellIndex &a_cell_index) const 
00032 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00033     throw(std::logic_error)
00034 #endif    
00035   {
00036     UInt_t layer_i=a_cell_index.getLayerIndex();
00037     UInt_t row_i=a_cell_index.getWaferRow();
00038     UInt_t column_i=a_cell_index.getWaferColumn();
00040     if (   layer_i>=_moduleIndexArray.size() 
00041         || row_i>=_moduleIndexArray[layer_i].size()
00042         || column_i>=_moduleIndexArray[layer_i][row_i].size() ) {
00043       throw std::range_error("ModuleIndexReverseLookup::getModuleAndCellIndex> The layer index or the wafer row or column points beyond the module lookup array.");
00044     }
00045 
00046     //#endif
00047     UInt_t module_index=_moduleIndexArray[layer_i][row_i][column_i];
00048 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00049     if (a_cell_index.getCellIndex()<mapping.getCellIndexOffset(module_index)) {
00050       throw std::logic_error("ModuleIndexReverseLookup::getModuleAndCellIndex> The given geometrical cell index does not seem to be assigned to a pad of a defined module.");
00051     }
00052 #endif
00053 
00054     CellIndex geom_cell_index(a_cell_index.getCellIndex()-mapping.getCellIndexOffset(module_index));
00055     row_i=geom_cell_index.getWaferRow();
00056     column_i=geom_cell_index.getWaferColumn();
00057     UInt_t pad_row_i=geom_cell_index.getPadRow();
00058     UInt_t pad_column_i=geom_cell_index.getPadColumn();
00059 
00060     // If BOUNDARY_CHECK is defined the following method should throw an exception if module_index is out of bounds or
00061     // the type does not exist.
00062     UInt_t module_type=mapping.getModuleType(module_index);
00063 
00064 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00065     if (module_type>=_moduleTypeArray.size() 
00066         || row_i>=_moduleTypeArray[module_type].size()
00067         || column_i>=_moduleTypeArray[module_type][row_i].size() 
00068         || pad_row_i>=_moduleTypeArray[module_type][row_i][column_i].size()
00069         || pad_column_i>=_moduleTypeArray[module_type][row_i][column_i][pad_row_i].size()) {
00070       throw std::range_error("ModuleIndexReverseLookup::getModuleAndCellIndex> The wafer or pad row or column points beyond the cell lookup array.");
00071     }
00072 #endif
00073     UInt_t cell_index=_moduleTypeArray[module_type][row_i][column_i][pad_row_i][pad_column_i];
00074 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00075     if (cell_index>mapping.getNCellsPerModule(module_index)) {
00076       throw std::range_error("MipSignalHistograms::processEvent> could not identify cell of a hit.");
00077     }
00078 #endif              
00079 
00080     return make_pair(module_index,cell_index);
00081   };
00082 
00083 protected:
00084   SimpleArray_t< SimpleArray_t<  SimpleArray_t< unsigned short > > > _moduleIndexArray; 
00085   typedef SimpleArray_t< SimpleArray_t<  SimpleArray_t< SimpleArray_t< unsigned short > > > > CellIndexArray_t;
00086   SimpleArray_t< CellIndexArray_t > _moduleTypeArray;   
00087 };
00088 }
00089 #endif
